alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:25PM EDT until July 20 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TUSCOLA...NORTHERN LAPEER AND NORTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES... At 223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Otter Lake, or over Columbiaville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Mayville around 235 PM EDT. North Branch and Clifford around 240 PM EDT. Kingston around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include East Dayton, Burnside, Wilmot, Kings Mill, Silverwood, Genesee and Fostoria. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
